comment.author: 7229750@N07
comment._content: The familiar Rolls Royce / Sentinel 0-6-0DH looks very handsome in Portuguese colours ! Designed by Sentinel in both two axle and three axle form, in Britain they were widely used by industry, and the link below shows a preserved example which was originally owned by London Transport: www.train-photos.com/picture/number6044.asp . The Portuguese locos are briefly mentioned on the Wiki page at en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sentinel_Waggon_Works#Sentinel_Stee... - were they built by SOREFAME ?

comment.author: 39896969@N05
comment._content: Oi! Sou administrador de um grupo chamado CP 1151 / Sentinel shunters e nós adoraríamos ter isto adicionado ao grupo!
